programmes.show_description: Thriller starring Hannah Barefoot. After surviving a train wreck, a married woman loses her memory. As the pieces of her old life start to come together, will the truth tear her apart? (2017)
Thriller with Emily Rose. Wishing for a better life for her and her daughter, a struggling mother makes a pact with two strangers who say they can 'eliminate' her problems (2017).
False Prophet: A kidnapping investigation sends Sue on a dangerous undercover operation to expose a cult.
An uplifting round-up of good news stories from the UK and around the world.

...Unseen: Murder mystery with Courtney Thorne-Smith. While at a 17th century archaeological site, Emma and her students find a very modern-day body - and help an FBI agent excavate the truth. (2017)
An uplifting round-up of good news stories from the UK and around the world.
...Unseen: Murder mystery with Courtney Thorne-Smith. While at a 17th century archaeological site, Emma and her students find a very modern-day body - and help an FBI agent excavate the truth. (2017)
About Face: A homeless man's accidental death exposes a kidnapping and murder that lead Carrie and Al to investigate a construction company's ties to a multi-state crime spree.
In The Belly Of The Beast: Beckett is recruited for a covert narcotics mission which soon turns deadly. Beckett must unravel a conspiracy which leads her to face a foe from her past.
Stage Death: When a play about murder becomes a crime scene on opening night, can super-sleuth photographer Allie Adams capture the culprit? (2020)
An uplifting round-up of good news stories from the UK and around the world.
Stage Death: When a play about murder becomes a crime scene on opening night, can super-sleuth photographer Allie Adams capture the culprit? (2020)
All American Murder: Dr Sloan investigates the suspicious death of his new neighbour. The case soon leads the team to the local marine base.
Murder in the Courthouse: Dr Sloan's jury service ends, but he is soon investigating a car bomb that kills a suspected hitman moments after he is acquitted of murder.
Bloodlines: Jessica researches her new book, set in the competitive world of horse racing. But can she prove who murdered a highly respected racehorse trainer?
A Killing In Cork: Jessica travels to Cork to visit one of her old friends. Can she prove whether her friend's estranged son is guilty of murdering an American relative?
The wreckage of a small plane laden with drugs and cash exposes a terrorist plot to attack commercial aircraft. Meanwhile, Sue and Jack are invited on a double date.
The Way Of The Ninja: When a Japanese ballerina is mysteriously murdered, Castle and Beckett's investigation into her secret life leads them straight to the top of the Yakuza.
Bad Company: Capt. Russo is suspected in the murder of an informant, leading Carrie and Al into a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with a corrupt former cop.
...For Murder: Crime mystery starring Jewel. When Shannon finds a body in the house she's been hired to renovate, can this unlikely sleuth dust off the clues and crack a murder case too? (2017)
An uplifting round-up of good news stories from the UK and around the world.
...For Murder: Crime mystery starring Jewel. When Shannon finds a body in the house she's been hired to renovate, can this unlikely sleuth dust off the clues and crack a murder case too? (2017)
Christmas: When they find a little girl's urgent plea to God among the letters to Santa, can the postal detectives deliver hope this Christmas? (2014)
An uplifting round-up of good news stories from the UK and around the world.
Christmas: When they find a little girl's urgent plea to God among the letters to Santa, can the postal detectives deliver hope this Christmas? (2014)
Thriller starring Holly Deveaux. After moving in with their mum and her new husband, two sisters uncover a chilling trail of lies and deception (2017).
An uplifting round-up of good news stories from the UK and around the world.
Thriller starring Anna Hutchison. A public relations guru likes to keep a low profile, but risks her reputation to help a fading action star accused of killing his ex-wife (2019).

...Malice: No one digs a mystery like archaeologist Emma Fielding - so when a colleague is murdered in a crypt, she soon unearths a long list of suspects... (2018)

...Of Murder: Detective drama with Lori Loughlin. While organising a charity event, intrepid second-hand sleuth Jennifer must dust off the clues when a generous donor meets an untimely end. (2016)
An uplifting round-up of good news stories from the UK and around the world.
...Of Murder: Detective drama with Lori Loughlin. While organising a charity event, intrepid second-hand sleuth Jennifer must dust off the clues when a generous donor meets an untimely end. (2016)
Murder on the Run: Part 1: Dr Sloan is taken hostage by a prisoner who claims he is innocent of killing his estranged wife.
Murder on the Run: Part 2: Dr Sloan is convinced his captor is innocent of murder. Can he unearth any fresh evidence that will prove who really killed the man's wife? Part 2 of 2.
Love And Hate In Cabot Cove: Jessica investigates the murder of a young police officer and the attempted shooting of Sheriff Metzger.
Murder At A Discount: Jessica is sued by a man claiming that one of her novels is based on his first wife's murder.
The Bounty Hunter: Jack has an altercation with a former agent turned bounty hunter who is determined to avenge his daughter's suicide.
The Greater Good: The investigation into the death of a Wall Street trader takes a shocking turn when the victim is revealed to be an undercover informant for the U.S. Attorney's office.
Paranoid Android: When a shooter triggers a flashback that doesn't add up with Carrie's memory, the team at Major Crimes discover a conspiracy is at play and trained killers are among them.
...Beach Murders: Whodunnit with Lori Loughlin. When a customer believes her husband's surfing death wasn't an accident, antiques expert Jennifer must dig up some secrets and find a killer. (2017)
An uplifting round-up of good news stories from the UK and around the world.

...Til Death Do Us Part: Mystery thriller with Candace Cameron Bure. When her dad is named as a murder suspect just before her wedding, can supersleuth Aurora solve the crime? (2021)
